body_html:
this is normal. NumPy uses special SIMD instructions on the CPU or uses cachelines better for accelerating pow. We will get there eventually, but haven't.
You might find something slower or faster on either library depending on the workflow. Given enough time and effort, we'll converge on the same speed.

body:
this is normal. NumPy uses special SIMD instructions on the CPU or uses cachelines better for accelerating pow. We will get there eventually, but haven't.
You might find something slower or faster on either library depending on the workflow. Given enough time and effort, we'll converge on the same speed.
